ing: 1 (15 ounce) can mandarin orange segments, drained
1 large Granny Smith apple, cut into bite-size chunks
des: "A spur-of-the-moment creation that is fresh and a delicious way to use up some CSA items! Can be served immediately or chilled to meld the flavors."
ins:
Remove fronds from fennel and chop finely. Discard stalks. Chop fennel bulb into bite-size chunks.
Combine fennel fronds, fennel bulb, mandarin segments, apple, spearmint, honey, and lime juice in a bowl; mix well.
